forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 24 overnight. West wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 33 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow after 1am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. South southwest wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 1pm. Cloudy, with a high near 34. West wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 26. West wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow between 10am and 4pm, then a chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 38. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 25. Northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Perfect conditions for skating and classic on Bucks Run. Golf course is not groomed and no info on whether it will be before the weekend.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: It is an ideal ski day at Nub's Nob. There is a bit of fluff sitting on top of the groom. The temperature is just below freezing and conditions are exceptional. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
